content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must admit, I'm a bit of a tough nut to crack when it comes to pricing. So, how about we start with 1500 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's an interesting starting point, Mr. Schmidt. I'm sure we can find a price that suits both of us. Why don't we discuss the amenities and the condition of the apartment a bit more before we settle on a price?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm open to that, Mr. Abbasi. The apartment is newly built and unfurnished, measuring 50 square meters with a single bedroom. It's in the city center and close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. Now, about that price... how about we go with 1400 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Mr. Schmidt. 1400 euros is a fair offer, considering the location and amenities. However, as a student, I'm looking to keep my expenses as low as possible. Would you be willing to go lower? Perhaps 1300 euros?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Mr. Abbasi, I'm a firm believer in getting the best deal possible. I'm willing to go lower, but let's split the difference. How about 1350 euros per month? That's as low as I can go, considering the quality of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your offer of 1350 euros per month is quite generous, Mr. Schmidt. I'm impressed by your willingness to negotiate. As a responsible and ethical individual, I believe this price reflects the value of the apartment. I agree to the price of 1350 Euro!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad we could find common ground, Mr. Abbasi. I agree to the price of 1350 Euro! Let's proceed with the lease agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful, Mr. Schmidt. I'm looking forward to signing the lease agreement. I believe we have a solid arrangement. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
